original_text: Then the Lord came down in the cloud and spoke to him, and took some of the Spirit that was on him and put it on the seventy elders. And as soon as the Spirit rested on them, they prophesied. But they did not continue doing it.
korean_text: 여호와께서 구름 가운데 강림하사 모세에게 말씀하시고 그에게 임한 영을 칠십 장로에게도 임하게 하시니 영이 임하신 때에 그들이 예언을 하다가 다시는 하지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord came down in the cloud
and took some of the Spirit that was on him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 있던 영 중에서 일부를 취하사

sentences.original_text: and put it on the seventy elders
And as soon as the Spirit rested on them
But they did not continue doing it
